product_name: Da URBAN® Merlion Office Chair,High Back Mesh Ergonomic Home Office Desk Chair with 3 Years Warranty, Adjustable Armrests,Adjustable Lumbar Support,Tilt Lock Mechanism (Grey)
script:
15-Second Script:

(Opening shot of a dull, cramped workspace. Cut to a shining Da URBAN® Merlion Chair moving into frame.)

VO: Break from the mundane. (Cut to a close-up of chair's Mesh fabric, PU cushioning, and ergonomic design.) Embrace comfort and style with Da URBAN's Merlion Office Chair. Sweat-free seating, high-back support, and full swivel - perfect for long sessions. (Show tilt-lock mechanism.) Plus, you'll save 20% today! (Flash 20% discount.)

---

30-50 Second Script:

(Shot of a dimly lit, cluttered workspace. Transition to a bright, clean workspace featuring the Da URBAN® Merlion Chair.)

VO: Push away discomfort. Step into a revolutionized workspace. (Pan over the chair's features.) 

(Different angle showing adjustable armrests and lumbar support.)

VO: Meet Da URBAN's Merlion Office Chair, a haven with thick moulded PU seat with a sweat-free mesh fabric. 

(Close-up of someone adjusting the height and tilt. Upholstery detail. Shots of 360º swivel, Heavy Duty Metal Base and Nylon Dual Wheels.)

VO: Discover what true comfort feels like with its adjustable detail. And not just comfort, but an assurance of quality with its robust material and 3-year warranty. 

(Scene changes to someone leaning back in their chair, relaxing.) 

VO: From long work hours to relaxed moments, your comfort is now customizable. 

(Shift to the product against a grey background. Bold 20% off flashes.)

VO: And guess what? Your chance to redefine comfort is now 20% less! Grab the opportunity today and experience the urban revolution with Da URBAN® Merlion Office Chair. 

(Switch to ending shot with logo and tagline.)

VO: Da URBAN® Merlion Office Chair - Expert in your comfort. Settle for nothing less.
